name: AWS Academy Cloud Foundations
description: The AWS Academy Cloud Foundations is intended for students who seek an overall understanding of cloud computing concepts, independent of specific technical roles. It provides a detailed overview of cloud concepts, AWS core services, security, architecture, pricing, and support.

name: TOEIC
description: The Test of English for International Communication (TOEIC) is an international standardized test of English language proficiency for non-native speakers. It is intentionally designed to measure the everyday English skills of people working in an international environment. I scored 920/990.

name: Enterprise Design Thinking Co-Creator
description: As a co-creator, I am an active contributor to Enterprise Design Thinking projects. I help bring concrete user outcomes to life by developing collaborative skills and finding opportunities to step up and lead.

name: Enterprise Design Thinking Practitioner
description: I have acquired knowledge about the application of Enterprise Design Thinking and its value. As a practitioner, I find opportunities to experiment with it in my daily work.

name: Nuit de l'Info 2022
description: La Nuit de l'Info is a national competition that brings together students, teachers and companies to work together on the development of a web application.

name: Apple Teacher
description: Apple Teacher is a free professional learning program designed to support and celebrate educators using Apple products for teaching and learning. As an Apple Teacher, I have learned how to use Apple products for teaching and learning.
